content.question: Which of the following is illustrated by the long-run aggregate supply <math alttext="open parenthesis, L R A S, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>(LRAS)</mtext></mrow></math> curve and the production possibilities curve <math alttext="open parenthesis, P P C, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>(PPC)</mtext></mrow></math>?

choices.label: The trade-off between inflation and unemployment

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
